title: So apparently this crosses the line...?
body:
How does this text call for chat ban...? Background I asked quinn to not go quinn top and she didnt listen to me and I told her every quinn ive played with sucked bad. And what does she do? she feeds off hard starts 0/4 So yes i called her an asshole which was entirely called for. I was upset at her cuz she was being a typical incoherent bronzer. She fed a kled who was 10/0 before dying once. This was all in a ranked game btw, stakes are high.
Game 1
Gards5FTW: wtf
Gards5FTW: jsut happened did she flash with me on her back? (i am ww I q'ed the adc and she flashed and im under tower somehow)
Gards5FTW: fuk u quinn
Gards5FTW: feeding ashole (shes 0/4)
Gards5FTW: i told u not to quinn
Gards5FTW: who goes quinn top anways
Gards5FTW: bronze fuckks
Gards5FTW: no
Gards5FTW: not anymore
Gards5FTW: Can u just shh and not feed
Gards5FTW: ???
Gards5FTW: WOW FLASH HARDER MUCH (they dodged my ult)
Gards5FTW: wow verigar (tp in and missed all his abilities)
Gards5FTW: shove
Gards5FTW: choke*
Gards5FTW: choke
Gards5FTW: how does he get his thing back? (died to kled when he had 10 hp and he got his horse thing back)
Gards5FTW: how does kled work?
Gards5FTW: how do u ger ur goat back?
Gards5FTW: how is hye soo fast
Gards5FTW: what the fuck is that movement speed??? (he chased me down from half a jg away)
Gards5FTW: tjhis is so gay
Gards5FTW: fuk kled
Gards5FTW: WHY THE FUCKK DONT U ANSWER ME
Gards5FTW: IM TALKING TO KLED
Gards5FTW: not u
Gards5FTW: dont understand this fuckingg gay horseshit
Gards5FTW: my ult dint work (ulted someone, and it didnt do anything, and lost my ult)
Gards5FTW: i pressed it and it fizzled
Gards5FTW: and did nothing
Gards5FTW: i didnt even leap
Gards5FTW: wow that was bad'
Gards5FTW: QUINN  WTF RUN DONT LET HIM AUTO u (quinn sat there and let naut auto attack her)
Gards5FTW: too alte u dead af
Gards5FTW: he fuckingg auto killed u, ur bad
Gards5FTW: no
Gards5FTW: u didnot
Gards5FTW: im trying but u fukces keep doing stupid shitt
Gards5FTW: MF  (mf didnt join fight when ult was available)
Gards5FTW: WTF
Gards5FTW: AND NOW IM DEAD
Gards5FTW: AND KLED IS NOT DEAD
Gards5FTW: 9/0
Gards5FTW: THIS IS NOT OK
Gards5FTW: WOW
Gards5FTW: IDIOYS
Gards5FTW: TARGET KLEDF
Gards5FTW: wjhy mf
Gards5FTW: HOW DOES KLED WORK????????
Gards5FTW: ggg

Ps I have talked to league behavior analysts and they only ban for offensive words, and normal curse words are generally not a big deal.

I'm so confused right now. It looks like this guy... retyped and editorialized his entire chat log? *Why?*

(While I'm on the topic, the other thing that will never make sense to me is when people say "and I only got reported by one person", under I guess the misguided assumption that people will always inform you in all-chat before hitting the button?)

> [{quoted}](name=Positioning King,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oxEgL46y,comment-id=00010000000000020002,timestamp=2017-04-19T17:57:47.775+0000)

Tantram, maybe you have an answer to this since it seems like you do a lot of checking into the logs...   

Wtf is a tit wiggler?  :P

If this is legitimately the only log you had, and you were not doing anything unusual like trolling with your build, this is a bit odd. Were you coming off a pre-existing punishment?

> [{quoted}](name=The Djinn,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oxEgL46y,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2017-04-19T03:21:15.472+0000)
>
> If this is legitimately the only log you had, and you were not doing anything unusual like trolling with your build, this is a bit odd. Were you coming off a pre-existing punishment?

I see 3 things Riot would consider toxic. Giving up: "anyone else want to ff at 15?", Harassing players "Why is annie still talking?.." (even if Riot looked over the full quote they might find this part toxic), and asking for a report "im reporting annie,..." Riot considers this player harassment as well.

> [{quoted}](name=Pouting,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oxEgL46y,comment-id=00010000000000010001,timestamp=2017-04-19T06:17:03.207+0000)
>
> I see 3 things Riot would consider toxic. Giving up: "anyone else want to ff at 15?", Harassing players "Why is annie still talking?.." (even if Riot looked over the full quote they might find this part toxic), and asking for a report "im reporting annie,..." Riot considers this player harassment as well.

I suppose. I don't see a problem with asking once for a surrender though -- it's clear he didn't continue asking, and it's a valid question. The Annie stuff might have gotten her annoyed, but it's pretty minor -- the two lines you pulled out were actually in his Team Chat rather than All Chat as well, so all the Annie would have seen were "Annie, can you stop talking in All Chat, thanks" and "Annie, you're just salty." Not GREAT behavior, but I know I'd let it slide, and I'm pretty quick to report.

As for asking for reports -- Riot's said it's okay in the right situation: i.e. it's fine if you say "Hey -- Annie was tossing racial slurs at us. Mind tossing her a report?", but it crosses the line when you're attempting to use reporting as harassment, threat, or to belittle a player (things like "Report top for feeding" when their build is fine and they may just be struggling).
I had been temperary-banned before, but this was the only log I had

> [{quoted}](name=Toxicate13,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oxEgL46y,comment-id=00010000000000010000,timestamp=2017-04-19T03:23:32.005+0000)
>
> I had been temperary-banned before, but this was the only log I had

Hm. If you had just come off a 14-day ban for toxicity and got reported in the next game, there's a chance that the system might have simply banned you based on that (or possibly on a back-log), but it's a little odd. Might be worth contacting player support if this was in one of your first games after returning: this one seems pretty tame from what you've listed here.

Either that or, somehow, the full logs didn't send. Can't say with the information I have.
Well, like I said, Riot is stupid. I was done being toxic after i got temp banned, but I guess Riot just wanted to fuck up my life.

> [{quoted}](name=Toxicate13,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oxEgL46y,comment-id=0001000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-19T03:29:31.502+0000)
>
> Well, like I said, Riot is stupid. I was done being toxic after i got temp banned, but I guess Riot just wanted to fuck up my life.

League of Legends shouldn't mean that much to you. If it does you need to continue contacting play support until you've chatted with every staff on the player Behavior team regarding your ban.

> [{quoted}](name=Gards5FTW,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=oxEgL46y,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-04-19T02:33:54.506+0000)

> Gards5FTW: fuk u quinn
> Gards5FTW: feeding ashole
> Gards5FTW: i told u not to quinn
>
> Gards5FTW: bronze fuckks
>
> Gards5FTW: tjhis is so gay
>
> Gards5FTW: dont understand this fuckingg gay horseshit
>
> Gards5FTW: he fuckingg auto killed u, ur bad
>
> Gards5FTW: im trying but u fukces keep doing stupid shitt
>
> Gards5FTW: IDIOYS

So, in addition to the derogatory use of the word "gay" (punishment worth by itself), you're also insulting your teammates pretty extensively. None of that is allowed.

The rest of the chat is pretty much entirely negative, which isn't doing you any favors and makes people more inclined to focus on where you go over the line into toxic behavior.

> Ps I have talked to league behavior analysts and they only ban for offensive words, and normal curse words are generally not a big deal.

If you've talked to League behavior analysts you should know that this behavior isn't allowed. Cursing is usually fine if it's not derogatory, but there's a big difference between "Fucking hell. Fat-fingered my ult. Sorry, guys" and "Fuck you Quinn, you feeding asshole." The former is still being a good community member, the latter is flaming a teammate.

>So yes i called her an asshole which was entirely called for...

It's never called for to insult a teammate. If you feel it is, be aware that Riot judges you only on your actions and what you say: the circumstances surrounding your statements have no bearing, as you should be able to control your behavior and not lash out in a toxic manner.

Also, looking at your match history, I see a 1/9/1 Amumu game, a 2/7/1 Shaco game, a 3/13/25 Shyvana game, a 2/13/17 Morgana game...and it looks like the Quinn in the game you're talking about still ended 10/7/8, so maybe give her a break? Everyone has bad games or match-ups they don't know, and it looks like she kept fighting and pulled through pretty well, even if not well enough to win.
I read the 1st few lines, and I can tell, you deserved it.
Also, Quinn top is indeed a thing.

> I have talked to league behavior analysts and they only ban for offensive words, and normal curse words are generally not a big deal.

Curse words aren't a big deal; harassment of other players is.

There is a significant difference between "Fuck me, I'm an idiot" and "Fuck you, you feeding asshole".
Guards?

> Ps I have talked to league behavior analysts and they only ban for offensive words, and normal curse words are generally not a big deal.

I'm sorry but you were being toxic. Calling players names and raging at them is player Harassment (which is bannable and in some cases hate-speech). Also, using words like "gay" is just a no no, it's hate-speech. Words like "gay" or "%%%" or even "%%%%" are all unacceptable by Riot's standards (in most context it is still considered hate speech). Unless this was a temp ban you should have two other chat logs, I'd like to see them if that is the case. If not and you're only temporarily banned, make sure to UNBIND your ENTER key when you start playing again, maybe also /mute all. It will make sure you don't say anything. After around 3-4 months you shouldn't have to UNBIND your ENTER key anymore or /mute all even if you haven't reformed. This is because your toxic tier will have decayed proving to Riot you have "reformed". If you're toxic again you'll get temporarily banned again if your toxic tier decays meaning you wont get banned even if you continue to be toxic. Please take my advice and don't make my mistake of waiting until it's too late.

You don't even know what each champion does, but that doesn't stop you from telling your team what they should pick or what they shouldn't pick.

Blaming everything that goes wrong on the top lane pick is unacceptable behaviour...it's also completely stupid, ignorant and absolutely not fair to do that.

Overall your attitude was very negative.

Learn your own champion first and stop being so annoying.

So about Quinn top. It is a thing, and is pretty powerful as well. You just need to adjust your strategy when your team's not going the way you think it should. PPS I only used Gay in a general sense of what happened in the game, It was never directed at anyone in particular, So that is not bannable. It the same as yelling "fuck" after you deded.

Actually, it's not quite the same as yelling "fuck". Using "gay" as a synonym for "bad" or the likes is an implicit insult to gay people.
Imagine people started using your name to describe things that are bad, specifically because they dislike you. Imagine it catching on because, once again, people dislike you. And now imagine that some people still use it because they dislike you, and a huge amount of people use it simply out of habit and because they don't give a shit about the fact that it's an implicit insult to you.

Using "gay" to describe things you dislike is at best insensitive and at worst homophobic.

First off its not a thing when u start the game 0/4, secondly, I asked her politely in lobby to not go quinn top which she did and fed. 3rdly I am talking in all caps so that they read what I say and realize 'wow i was being dumb and I fed them for no reason' Bronze elo is sooo aggravating.
